values:
Right now my leg is PAIN FREE from the nerve block*! YEAH* 
After the nerve block my migrains started to come back!
I stayed in bed for a week and didn't barely come out of my room except for the bathroom and food*!
I went back to my neurologist and he up my Cymbalta and gave me somthing else for emergencies!
After about 3 to 4 days my migrains went away*!
I have been exhausted lately*!
We had a yard sale on saturday and was outside from about 9am to 7pm*!
So, Sunday we were cleaning out our garage and I couldn't get outside to help*!
I slept from 2:30pm to 6:00pm which is alot for me*!
I got Sunburn on Saturday which hurt my arm really badly*!
I am really tired right now but i'm going to try to do some school work*!
Then probally going to lay down for alittle bit*!
I will try to up-date sooner this time*!
*Ashley Nicole*

Today I went to my pain management appointment!!! I go to get a sympathetic nerve block on the 23rd of this month!!! I absolutly love my doctor he  is very good and helpful!! He understands what I have been going through for the past 3 years. He always tells me that he doesn't want to hurt me more then I already hurt, so, instead of doing the nerve block while i'm awake he puts me completely out so I don't stress myself!!! 

I didn't get to drive there because 1) We had my 2 year old niece with us and i'm a new driver and 2) I am only aloud to have 1 person and an other in the car with me while I have my permit!!!

I am going to go lay down because I didn't sleep all of my meds off, so, i'll probally fall asleep!! 

Then i'm going to try to do some math homework!!!

Love all,
Ashley Nicole

Tuesday I got my permit and today for the first time I drove with my mom!!!!! YAY

Tomarrow I go to my pain management doctor. He will probally give me a nerve block for my leg and hopefully will be back to normal! Lets hope so!!!! He might try something else but I am not sure!!! 

I'll update more after my appointment tomarrow!!!

<font size="3">I went to the hospital last night because I was in so much pain with my leg. It hurts so0o bad. I have a knee brace on my knee and i am going to get an ankle brace too. I know that the worst thing for RSD is putting it in splints and everything but when I walk it feels unstable. So, a brace would stablize it.  The doctors were the same ones I had a few weeks ago when I went to the hospital for my arm. They are very nice and understanding and did the best they could for me and didn't judge me! I can't get an appointment with my pain management doctor until April 14th till then I will be in a wheel chair going to the stores and everything. My arm is doing good since it is getting warmer outside. Well I will update more later. Love, Ashley</font>

My leg is still not doing good. I am in so0o0o much pain! I have an appointment to go back to go back to my anestegeologist in woodbury. I will probally get another nerve block!

I'll put more up here later! Love, Ashley

On Saturday I went to the Williamstown High School with my 2 best friends Michelle and Jess. We watched play called Guys And Dolls. It was very good!! 

Sunday morning I woke up and my bad leg hurt. It is still hurting very badly but still isn't sensitive which is good. I am off the methadone(thank god). Friday I was diagnosised with TMJ in my mouth. Our family doctor said that they treat TMJ with Nortryptaline(SP?). I came off of it like a month ago. So, he said that I probally had it for awhile but the Nortryptaline hid it.

I'll update more on my leg later!

Well I went to the doctors the other day! He wants me to ween off the methadone (thank god) I was having really bad nose bleeds from it and other stuff!  He doubled up on my cymbalta because I started to get migrains again. He wants me to find a place that does the low doses of Ketamine because he feels that would be the best option for me. So, i'm going to doctor in Hahnemann Hospital in Philadelphia. He works under Dr. Swartzman. I am so excited because this might be the answer I have been waiting for.!! I will update more later on that! 

Also today I had to go to the chirpractor because I had a flare up in my arm sunday and ended up in the hospital and from holding my arm all scrunched up my back went out so it is starting to feel better because of the stuff he did to me!

Ashley*

The Methadone is making me so tired. I was so0o tired the other day from it that I had to call my mom home from work because I couldn't watch Jordyn. I also feel sick from it. I lost about 10 pounds from not eating(it makes me feel filled). Also something else is going on but I don't want to say it on here so everyone can see it. LOL. My side feels GREAT. I get itching from the Methadone and now I can actually scratch my side, NORMALLY Instead of NOT. YES! Well I have to go lay around so i'll get more up later! Love, Ashley Nicole!
To find out more about Reflex Sympathetic Dystrophy go to www.rsdhope.org
Today I went to take my driving test for my permit. It was very hard to consentrate in DMV. I did not pass because of that and I am very upset about it. I will try again next week.

Today the drivers ed guy came out and took all my information. He should call back next week to come pick me up to go take my written test to get my permit. Yeah!!!! Also today I started a RSD group on yahoo here is the link.... http://groups.yahoo.com/group/fightingtheflames4ever
And please spread the word. Thanks i'll update more later!
Ashley Nicole

I am doing alright today! My throat and cough is doing alot better! My leg is still pain free! My arm and side are horrible. Too much cold for me! I want summer to come! My mom and dad still haven't filled my perscription for the methadone. I want to try but they are too scared still to put me on it. Right now I am researching RSD/and/Methadone. Nothing else is really new. Tuesday the person from Mike's driving school is going to come out and get there money and my information. Then we will schedule an appointment for me to go take my written test! Yeay. Can't wait! I'll update more later! Loves, Ashley

Vanessa, Did you ever take Methadone for your RSD? If so, How did it make you feel? Did it work? My doctor wants me to go on it but my mom and dad are very concerned about me going on it! What do you think?


I am very sick today. I think i'm either getting bronchitus or neumonia again! So, hopefully this isn't happening to me again!

My Birthday was the best my mom threw me a surprise party! It was so much fun! Once my glasses come in I will go to get my permit! Can't wait! I didn't get no pictures on my birthday because I didn't know everyone was going to be here! But I was surprised!

I had a neurologist appointment today and he wants to try me on high doses of methadone. We said we are willing to try anything. He also wants us to try to call either Cooper or Jefferson hospital to see if they do the low doses of Ketamine (since they just lowered the age limit in the U.S. to 16yrs old. He said I would be the perfect person to try Ketamine. He also said I was one of the youngest people to try the methadone. Let's cross our fingers and hope it works!

I'll update more my arm is having a hard time writing. Love, Ashley

Sorry it so long for me to update! I am doing ok just wiped out! My arm is ok I can't put a shirt on so I have been wearing a spagetti strap shirt for a long time. 

Tomarrow I got to go to the eye doctor because my eyes have gotten worse and I need to get glasses so sometime next week I can go get my permit so I can start driving! Yeah! My 16th Birthday is in 4 days. My mom and Dad are letting me get my permit so hopefully this will make me feel alittle more independent! I have been studying alot. I dread going to the eye doctor because they are going to shine lights in my eyes and that gives me a migrain! ughh!

I am having a couple friends sleepover saturday to sunday then sunday some more people are coming over to celabrate! I am so excited!

I also have a nerologists appointment coming up next week sometime!

I have to go wake Jordyn up from her nap! Love , Ashley

<font color="#000000" size="3">Sorry I haven't updated lately it's just been crazy with christmas than new years and now this sunday is Heathers 24th birthday then the saturday after is Katies 22nd birthday then the 27th is my 16th birthday! I am doing o.k. My leg is doing great! My arm is doing horrible it is in soo much pain from the coldness! Now my shoulder is all stiffened and now I have to go back to the Cirapractor (sp?) again! I have been really tired lately! My mom and I are going to join the animal shelter as volanteers to halp me get hours for girl scouts! Jordyn is getting soo big! She is very bad and a handful for me to watch but it is also alot of fun! I'll update later and hopefully have some new pictures to add!</font>

<font color="#00ccff" size="3">Hope you had a very nice Christmas! I did. Jordyn was so0o much fun! My leg is still doing good. NO PAIN STILL!!!!!! My arm is still really bad and is getting worse. I can never win. I'll put some pictures up another day hopefully soon!</font>

My leg is stil doing good but today when I picked jordyn up today my bad arm's elbow popped and now I barely can move my arm and it hurts really bad.
I am so0o excited for christmas! Only 4 mored days!

Here is a video I made by myself today!

<lj-embed id="1" />

Still going strong!!

Lately all I have been doing is sleeping. When Jordyn goes down for a nap. I have to. I don't know what this new thing is but i'm worried something is wrong. Today my dad is off from work so he got up with Jordyn and watched her till I got up. I got out of bed at 11:00am. Then he had to go get wood. Now I think I want to lay back down for a little bit because I am exhausted. 

My leg is doing good still. 

Well I'll write more later!@!

It has been 5 days that I have gotten my nerve block! I am still in NO pain. Right now my fear is that it is going to come back on a stupid mistake (like Jordyn is being bad and in that kicking stage and when she doesn't get her way she kicks my leg, or just twisting my foot.) I'm really scared that it will come back and I don't want it to. 

I finally got rid of my leg pain and now my arm pain is getting worse and worse. I can't really take it. I hate the cold!! It makes my pain SO much worse. I have been drinking lots of hot tea and hot chocolate to try to keep me warm!

Yesturday was our family Christmas party/ 
pollyanna(sp?)party. It was nice seeing everyone since I don't see them much since they have there our lifes.
I can feel my legs now! There is NO pain in my leg.! And I can walk without my cane! YAY! Let's hope it stays this way for a long time!

Today I had my nerve block. I was knocked out for it. I can't feel either of my legs because he said the stuff he put in leaked onto my right side so now I can't feel either legs or move them! My dad knew he couldn't get me into the house by himself. So, Heather's boyfriend who is an EMT told us to call the police station and have them send out an ambulance to the house. So, we were on the way home and the ambulance station is right by our house so we stopped there and they followed us home and put me in this special chair and got me upstairs. So, now i'm all settled and in my wheelchair. I am in NO pain in my leg since it is still numb! Just pray that when the numbness goes away the pain stays away too! Right now I am very tired and am going to lay down. I'll update in the morning since the numbness should be gone by then.

I went to Dr. Ressler today. He said he is not sure if my leg has RSD in it because it feels better to be rubbed but he is not sure what it is. He is going to do a nerve block for my leg to see if they can give me any relief! I go this wednesday the 5th to get that done so please pray that it works!

I have been writing poems lately here is 1 of them please tell me what you think!

This is call NOT GOING DOWN!

It doesn't matter anymore
I had to go through the door

The other door slammed
It closed with a bam

So many tests
I try my best

You can't help me
Just let me be

I can't walk without a cane
They tell me that i'm insane

I feel like i'm baking
Every doctor thinks i'm faking

Why do they think this 
All I want is a kiss

God doesn't give you anything you can't handle
Turn out the lights and let me blow out my 16 candles

Because I aint going nowhere
I am not going down without a fight!



Hope you like it written by the one and only Ashley McFadden!

Ok...! So I am really tired because i didn't fall asleep till after 11:00pm and then woke up at 12:30am, fell back to sleep around 1:00am then woke back up at 2:30am and I have been awake ever since! ughh.. I can't take not sleeping anymore. You would think it would catch up to you after awhile but it hasn't. 

My leg is only getting worse and now that it is cold out I can't get outside and my arm and side hurts worse. My leg is not yet sensitive to anything (it feels better to rub it) and hopefully it stays that way! 

I am just getting over being sick. That was the first time with RSD that I got sick like that. I am still cough just alittle.

I am now baby sitting Jordyn 4 days a week so my mom can go to work.

I had an orthodontist appointment today and he put chains and other things in my mouth but that isn't bad and doesn't hurt.

December 3rd I have an appointment with a doctor I went to in the begining of when my RSD started. He couldn't do anything because I didn't have any physical therapy but now I have had it, So, hopefully he will help and if not then we will probally be going to Boston.

I will update more later and hopefully add some pictures!

I have been very sick for the past week I have strep throat, my ears hurts and a fever. Then everything cleared up and a nasty cough started. I went to the doctors and he sent me for chest x-rays and then I got worse and couldn't take the pain from my RSD side from coughing so0o bad that my mom and dad took me to the hospital. They said I have pneumonia. They did breatheing treatments and other things. Now my mom wants to take me to the hospital again because I can't stop coughing. ughh. I'll up-date later!

Today I am exhausted! I had to get up at 7:00 this morning to be at my doctor at 7:45. That is just too early in the morning for me! He said to continue to do physical therapy and to go to a pain management doctor! He said it is most likely RSD, since every test came back negative. I am also exhausted because I have strep throat. Ughh. I hate this! Now I am going to go get a nice hot shower and do my hair. That sounds good. LOL. I'll put pictures of my leg that a took a few days ago.

Sorry I haven't written in here forever! I am very weak and tired! My leg is the same. I went and got a bone scan. I am going back to a doctor soon to see if it is RSD. Pray it is not! Here are some pictures(sorry it took forever).


Here is Jordyn iin my go-kart pretending to drive!


Jordyn getting ready to ride her bike!


My dad riding my go-kart!


Jordyn running!


This picture of Jordyn looks like one from the back of a picture frame you just bought!


Jordyn again!


Jordyn and I outside playing!


The other day I was baby sitting Jordyn and I couldn't find her and when I did find her.... this is where she was.... in the dogs crate.... LOL

Hope you liked the pictures. I'll up-date as soon as possible!

Sorry I have not written in days and days but I have been very busy and tired! 

I went to the doctors today and they do not know what is wrong with my leg. Ughh! What else is knew with me?

I just woke up again because last night I was up vomiting all night.

I am sorry I have not got the pictures up yet but I am working on it!

I will try to update again soon!

Sorry I haven't written in 5 days but I have been very buisy with doctors and home schooling activities and also baby sitting Jordyn. Right now I am goning to go take my go-kart over to our friends house and try to ride it for alittle bit. I am going to put recent pictures I took of Jordyn up as soon as possible. I'll right more later.!! 

P.S. I am starting to make a buddy4u profile for RSD. So, I am also buisy with that.!

Today I had a doctors appointment for my leg. He is not sure what is wrong with my leg. So, I have to get another  
x-ray of my foot and have to get an MRI of my leg. ughh! Can't anything just be easy! This is only going to make me stronger! I'll update you later on my leg.

Well last night I woke up and I could feel half of my foot that I couldn't feel (Good..Right?) but that part that came back from being numb is in a huge amount of pain (ughh.. living with RSD is def. not fun... Right?).  Then it went dumb and I couldn't feel it! (weird? I know...) Us RSDers can't ever get a break! When a + comes there is always a - that comes right behind it! UGH.! 

Well now I got to go take my pain meds to see if that works or not!
Please pray for me I need it.!

Last night I had a major breakdown. I just can't take not having friends that can come over! I went to this TEEN group which I was really excited about but I just didn't fit in! My social skills are so0o horrible. I was doing good (there was about 8 kids) until the group doubled its size. Then I just completely freaked and got scared. So, we came home and I just broke down in tears! I just feel so0o alone! I want to meet new people and make new friends that know what I am going through but I don't know how to!

I am in so much pain it is unbelieveable. I slammed my bad arms finger in the bathroom door! So, that is swollen and hurts!

I'll up date you later!

Do you ever feel like giving up? 

Everything is going downhill and sometimes I just feel like giving up! I just feel like going to a better place where I won't feel pain or have any worries or won't have to deal with doctors!

I don't want to give up. I just want everything to get better but I know I just have to be patient and wait it out!

Right now I am waiting for my sister to get here to hang out with her till my mom gets back from the hair dressers. 

I will update you later when I am feeling some what better!

Well the past couple days I have been in what used to be my sisters room and I moved into it last night...! Right now Jordyn is in here playing on my mattress which is on the floor till I get my bed...! She is having a blast! I had physical therapy again yersturday and I have it tomarrow too. Ughhhh. 

I am in so much pain in my arm but I am trying to deal with it. I just feel like crying. 

I will try to post again soon!

Well yesturday was a rough day.

First we had to go to the doctors which he said I just pulled ligaments and muscles that I have to do 2 weeks of physical therapy.

Then after we had to rush bear to the animal hospital because monday night we saw he had these 2 puncture wounds one his front upper leg and one on his groin area. My dad made a vet appointment but they couldn't get him in until 10:30 today. Well when we got home from the doctors there was blood all over the kitchen(it looked like someone was murdered) so, my dad called back the vet and said that he was literly bleeding to death so, they said to bring him in. Well, all they could to for now was give us an antibiotic and pain meds to keep him comfortable till it will stop bleeding.(they would not give him stiches because they could cause more problems on a dog his size(He is 3 pounds). He is still bleeding pritty bad but it is starting to slow down!

Tomarrow I start physical therapy at 1:00. ughh. I hate physical therapy. "I think I did my share."

I will update you later on Bear and physical therapy.!

I had a crazy weekend!!

Saturday- Katie was moving out so I had to help watch Jordyn and help unpack as much as I could!

Sunday- My whole family went to church and watched my mom be baptised. It was a 2 hours service so it was had for me and Jordyn to sit through that whole thing but we managed for my mom! She was baptised by the bishop and then there was an after party thing and the bishop blessed me which was an honar! Then after we went to Katie's and unpacked more things.

Today- I am just going to lay around because I am so0o tired and in alot of pain!

Tomarrow- I am going to another doctor that I have seen for all my broken bones and hurt bones to see what he says about my leg since I am still in alot of pain! So, I will update you after the appointment!

Now we are going to start working on my sister's room which I am going to move into since it is bigger! Can't wait!!

<font color="#ff6600" size="1"> Well today I have been very upset because Williamstown kids went back to school. This means my only 2 friends went back to school! So, now I thought I had no friends to begin with now I really have NONE. I know I have friends on the internet to talk to but it is not the same as people coming to the house to visit! It is so hard for me to make friends because 1. I have RSD and trying to explain to them what that is, is very hard for meand they don't understand and get freaked out because of it ,and,  2. I had a hard time making friends with people to begin with because I am very shy. All I want is for 1 friend that lives close to me that is home all day that I can hang out with.</font>

I just got back from the shore a couple of hours ago. We only went for the night since we had to take our tent down because summer is coming to an end! I couldn't go swimming but I sat on the beach and talked to everyone. I didn't swim because 1. it was too COLD and 2. my leg is still in bad shape! I accomplished alot of homework today when I got hame and rested in bed! I am feeling very sleepy because I was up past 12:30 last night talking with the girls and on top of that I took my pain meds which are working for my leg but unfortunatly not on my arm and side! I had so much fun last night with Casey and Alicia! We didn't eachothers hair! I don't get to do that often because I don't really have anyone my age! I am going to go rest, right now! I will write tomarrow!

<font color="#3366ff" size="1">I am in extreme pain right now because I walked on my  foot all day! I am going to lay down and elevate it and put ice on it! I will update you later on how my leg is!!</font>

<font color="#336699" size="2"> Today I went to the doctors! He said he thinks I tore a ligament. I don't think I have a tore ligament though! And it is definitly not the RSD because it feels better when I push on it and pain meds work! I have to go back next friday and if it is not better than I don't know whats going to happen!</font>

I am going to the doctors tomarrow because the one doc. is vacation and they are so0o booked with appointments! Right now I just took my pain meds and now they are making my feel sick to my stomach! I'll update you on my doctors appointment tomarrow when I am done!

<font color="#ff0000" size="1">My leg still hurts and I am definitly not sleeping at all!! My mom is taking me to our family doctor tomarrow. And we will see what happens after and then I will write an update!</font>

<font color="#3366ff" size="2">Today My mom and I took Jordyn to the park for a little bit since my leg hurt really bad and I couldn't stand on it for long! And plus Jordyn was cranky! Then we went to Wal- Mart and did some shopping! Right now I don't even know what i'm typing because they have me on pain killers for my leg(which work)(thank god!) Unfortunatly has not worked for my arm or leg! I accomplished alot in school work today! That made me happy! Now I am going to rest since Jordyn is getting a bath and than going to bed!!!!! I love her to death but today she was so0o0o bad and got into everything!</font>

Yesturday I went to the hospital for my leg. The doctor said she didn't see any broken bones(the person who reads the x-rays isn't there on sundays) So, she said they would call if he saw something she didn't. So, she wrapped it in and ace bandage because pressure feels better on it and gave me one crutch since I can't use two due to my arm and side. 

This was my first time going to virtua in berlin since we are done with Kennedy in Washington Township! They almost killed me twice and they are not very understanding of my RSD! Virtua was very understanding! Thank God! 

MY leg still hurts but they gave some pain meds so they are working!

I will update you later!

It now feels like I am going backward, back to how it was, feeling sick, tired, and in pain that is now starting to take over my life AGAIN. I know I have to stop it some how but I don't know how to! 

After Wednesday night of waking up and having pain in my legs it went away in my right leg and last night while I was babysitting Jordyn I trip and feel over the gate with her in my arms. She was fine thank god. She landed on me, but me , my leg got stuck on the gate and now my left leg is hurting badly.

I will update you tomarrow again about how I am feeling!

Sorry, I didn't update you sooner! My doctors appointment went good. He took me off of my norotriptyline and upped my cymbalta! But unforutnatly I am most likely going back on it! Last night I went to bed at 11:00(because my friend slept over), I didn't fall asleep till 1:00 and then woke up at 2:00 and be awake since! But when I woke up at 2:00 my ankles were killing me for some reason and they are still hurting but not as bad!

The weirdest thing happened today my sister called me upstairs and told me my neighbor was over talking to my mom and he said earlier this morning he was diagnosed with RSD. What a weird world we live in?

I'll write back tomarrow! When hopefully I feel better!

<font size="1">The past couple days has been boring.... Alot of relaxing and trying to catch up on sleep and doing alot of school work! But other than that I have been doing o.k.  I have been it TONS of pain and the weather doesn't help it at all! I haven't been feeling good at all! I go back to the neurologists tomarrow so he can mess with my meds and make me feel worse for a couple days! I will update you tomarrow!</font>
